markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Ratfolk](/Traits.aspx?ID=234)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 269 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

A creature with this trait is a member of the ratfolk ancestry. Ratfolk are [humanoids](/Traits.aspx?ID=91) who resemble rats. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by ratfolk.
name: Ratfolk
